I took a look at this item in detail and my heart swelled with joy. This instantly brought relief to my mind and my heart. I ordered two of the Vintage Teardrop necklaces. One in sterling silver center and the other in gold. They both will now be with me, close to my heart. I can tell you Ida Memory   filled my requests down to the last letters and symbols. review_text: At first I was very impressed with the shop. Timely delivery, the necklace I ordered came in 3 days or less. When it was delivered the charms on the necklace were wrong (wrong stone for the month). I checked to make sure it was not my fault but I had typed the correct month. I contacted the seller and she said she would send me a replacement immediately free of charge. I was super impressed! However, when the replacement came it was just the 3 replacement charms. Which meant I had to pry apart the original necklace and get the 3 wrong ones off and the 3 new ones on. I am a young adult and this was still super difficult.. any time you’re trying to fix jewelry it’s tough just because it was so small. I was a little put off that I had to disassemble and reassemble the entire necklace myself. It worked out but it was annoying.
